travel.description:
Grand Prize winner will receive a 4-day/3-night trip for four (4) to Universal Orlando® Resort to attend A Celebration of Harry Potter™ FL (“Trip”). ”). TRIP MUST BE TAKEN BETWEEN JANUARY 28, 2016 AND JANUARY 31, 2016.
Trip includes; economy class round-trip air travel for four (4) to Orlando, FL from the airport nearest to winner’s home (as determined by Sponsor);
three (3) nights’ hotel accommodations at Loews Royal Pacific Resort (standard room, quadruple occupancy);
round trip transportation to and from Orlando, FL airport and hotel;
four (4) 3-Day Park-to-Park Admission Tickets to both Universal Orlando theme parks;
exclusive evening at The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ with desserts and one complimentary Butterbeer™;
special themed Welcome Parcel;
special guest access to the A Celebration of Harry Potter™ Expo;
special guest access to select Panels and Demonstrations;
exclusive talent Q&A session with select Harry Potter™ film talent;
early park admission to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ one hour before the theme park opens;
one (1) breakfast for four (4) at the Three Broomsticks™ in Hogsmeade™;
commemorative merchandise elements from A Celebration of Harry Potter™;
access to select Live Entertainment at Universal CityWalk®;
$500 in cash or cash equivalent;
and one (1) Blu-ray of Harry Potter: The Complete 8-Film Collection. ARV of Grand Prize: $6,120.00.
travel.title: Warner Bros. The Wizarding World of Harry Potter
